title: G. Debrekht Designocracy Happy Traveler with Squirrel Wood Carved Figurine - 821035
features: Handcarved and Hand-Painted Wood Carved Masterpiece
Individually numbered, comes with a Certificate of Authenticity
description: Invite the beauty of the season into your home with G.Debrekht's "masterpiece collection" of hand-painted wood carved Santa Claus sculptures and more. All masterpiece and masterpiece signature collection woodcarvings are individually hand numbered. Our holiday table top decor make wonderful collectible and nostalgic Christmas gifts. The old world classic art details on the sculptures painted by freehand include animals, nature, winter scenes, Santa Claus, Nativity and more inspired by an old Russian art technique. Using painting mediums of watercolor, acrylic and oil combinations G. Debrekht has developed a unique painting style. These masterpieces are carved from light Linden wood and the wood also varies slightly in color. Decorating your home for Christmas is a special time for families and with G. Debrekht holiday home decor you can create your own style and cultivate a holiday art gallery for all to enjoy. G. Debrekht's traditional vintage, fine art sculpted figures are delightful and imaginative. Each Santa Claus and figurines are artistically hand-painted with detailed scenes including classic Christmas art, winter wonderlands and Nativity art. In the spirit of giving, G.Debrekht holiday decor makes beautiful collectible Christmas and holiday gifts to share with loved ones. Every G.Debrekht holiday decoration is an original work of art sure to become a cherished family tradition and treasured by future generations to come!
